name: Mexican Stuffed Peppers
ingredients: 8 ounces cheddar cheese, shredded and divided
3 large green bell peppers, halved lengthwise and seeded

instructions.en: Brown ground beef, onion, and garlic in a large skillet; drain fat.
instructions.sk: Opečte mleté mäso, cibuľu a cesnak na veľkej panvici; zlejte tuk.
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンで挽肉、玉ねぎ、ニンニクを炒めて茶色くし、脂を切ります。

instructions.en: Stir in tomato sauce and taco seasoning. Simmer for about 10 minutes.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte paradajkovú omáčku a taco korenie. Varte asi 10 minút.
instructions.ja: トマトソースとタコシーズニングを加えて混ぜます。約10分間煮込みます。

instructions.en: Parboil pepper halves in salted boiling water for 3 minutes; drain and place in baking dish.
instructions.sk: Povarte polovice paprík v osolenej vriacej vode 3 minúty; sceďte a vložte do zapekacej misy.
instructions.ja: ピーマンの半分を塩を入れた沸騰水で3分間茹でます。水を切り、焼き皿に置きます。

instructions.en: Stir half the cheese into the meat mixture. Fill peppers with the meat and top with remaining cheese.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte polovicu syra do mäsovej zmesi. Naplňte papriky mäsom a posypte zvyšným syrom.
instructions.ja: チーズの半分を肉の混ぜ物に加えて混ぜます。ピーマンに肉を詰め、残りのチーズをのせます。

instructions.en: Bake at 350°F for 15-20 minutes until hot and bubbly and peppers are tender.
instructions.sk: Pečte pri 175°C 15-20 minút, kým nebude horúce a bublajúce a papriky mäkké.
instructions.ja: 350°F（175°C）のオーブンで15〜20分間、熱々になり泡立ち、ピーマンが柔らかくなるまで焼きます。

notes: Makes 3-6 servings depending on whether served as half or whole peppers.
